_header: As Jesu went on sides sere
_description: Gospel for Wednesday following 18th Sunday after Trinity, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLCottTibEVII.Note: Placed after the 19th Sunday in this MS.

BLHar4196.First Lines: Als ihesus crist went on sides sereþe folk had ferly all in fere…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And to be ȝemed with owten endeþus es oure godsspell all contend
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Simile est regnum celorum homini seminauit.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia iiii proxima secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 125ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.143-144.
